attributes.action: To call the Coalition Government into Disrepute, and force a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: Because of the endless lies, the lack of Public Trust, the cases of fraudulent and illegal expense claims made, the failure to listen to what we, the Public want, need and require, for lowering the standards of 78% of the population to near destitution, for leaving this oncegreat Nation defenceless through excessive cut backs, and for selling this country to the lowest bid, I call for the Government be dissolved and to force a General Election as this Coalition Government is not fit to Govern.
